content.raw:
‘Frontend’ is too broad a term in 2019. You can love HTML/CSS and not JavaScript, or visa-versa. I think that’s ok. But we need terminology for both when hiring and planning career paths. Good post on this topic by @paul_v_m@twitter.com 

https://link.medium.com/tqo9v4jFvU
content.html:

content.raw: I don't feel like I've ever used Sentry.io in a way where it feels like an essential part of running an app. Error reporting is essential yes. But specifically Sentry? 🤷‍♂️ Has anyone had a mind blowing experience with another error reporting tool for JS browser apps?
content.html: I don't feel like I've ever used Sentry.io in a way where it feels like an essential part of running an app. Error reporting is essential yes. But specifically Sentry? 🤷‍♂️ Has anyone had a mind blowing experience with another error reporting tool for JS browser apps?
